name: bavarian
content:
Add to word list

in, coming from, or typical of the Bavaria region of southeast Germany: The company is based in the Bavarian town of Deggendorf. These are sweet Bavarian fritters, similar to doughnuts. The architecture here is distinctly Bavarian.
More examplesFewer examplesShe came from a tiny Bavarian village 150 miles southwest of Munich.As Bavarian Premier he oversaw economic success that made it Germany's richest state.He was born in the Bavarian municipality of Siegsdorf.We sipped Bavarian beer.Some of them prefer to describe themselves as Bavarian rather than German.
